mapper.insert: insert into chas_xt_xgpz (ID, ISDEL, DATA_FLAG, LRR_SFZH, LRSJ, XGR_SFZH, XGSJ, BAQID, BAQMC, JCKSSJ,JCKSSJFZ, JCJSSJ,JCJSSJFZ, JCJG) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isdel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{dataflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{lrrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lrsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{xgrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{xgsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{baqid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{baqmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{jckssj,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{jckssjfz,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{jcjssj,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{jcjssjfz,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{jcjg,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update chas_xt_xgpz set ISDEL = #{isdel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DATA_FLAG = #{dataflag,jdbcType=CHAR}, LRR_SFZH = #{lrrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LRSJ = #{lrsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, XGR_SFZH = #{xgrSfzh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XGSJ = date_trunc('second', now()), BAQID = #{baqid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BAQMC = #{baqmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JCKSSJ = #{jckssj,jdbcType=INTEGER}, JCKSSJFZ = #{jckssjfz,jdbcType=INTEGER}, JCJSSJ = #{jcjssj,jdbcType=INTEGER}, JCJSSJFZ = #{jcjssjfz,jdbcType=INTEGER}, JCJG = #{jcjg,jdbcType=INTEGER} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, ISDEL, DATA_FLAG, LRR_SFZH, LRSJ, XGR_SFZH, XGSJ, BAQID, BAQMC, JCKSSJ, JCKSSJFZ, JCJSSJ,JCJSSJFZ, JCJG from chas_xt_xgpz where isdel = 0 and ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select ID, ISDEL, DATA_FLAG, LRR_SFZH, LRSJ, XGR_SFZH, XGSJ, BAQID, BAQMC, JCKSSJ, JCKSSJFZ, JCJSSJ,JCJSSJFZ, JCJG from chas_xt_xgpz
1=1 and isdel = 0
and BAQID = '${baqid}'
and JCJG = '${jcjg}'
and BAQID in (select baqref.baqid from chas_xt_baqref baqref where baqref.sydwdm ='${sydwdm}')
